participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and cheerful, Alex enjoys sharing interests with others.
participant_1.background: I love eating at McDonald's. Watching NASCAR races is a great way to spend a Sunday for me. My parents both are school teachers. I want to own a house on a beach.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit shy, Emily expresses herself through art and enjoys sharing her passions.
participant_2.background: My dream is to be a veterinarian. I hate that my mom made me get braces. People say I talk when I am not supposed to. My three ring binder has my drawings of ponies all over it. I could eat less.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to draw ponies in my three ring binder.
That's cool! I like to draw too. What kind of ponies do you draw?
All kinds! I like to draw the characters from My Little Pony.
Oh, I love My Little Pony! I have a lot of the toys.
Me too! I have all of the Mane Six, plus some of the other characters.
That's awesome! Do you like to watch My Little Pony?
Yes! I watch it every day.
Me too! I love the show.
I don't know if I have a favorite episode, but I really like the one where Twilight Sparkle becomes Princess Twilight Sparkle.
That's a great episode! I also like the one where Rainbow Dash becomes a Wonderbolt.
That's a good one too! I love all the episodes.
Me too! I'm so glad I found someone else who likes My Little Pony.
Me too! It's so fun to talk to someone who loves the show as much as I do.
I know, right? It's so rare to find another fan.
